content.4: This day came ye out in the month Abib.

content.7: Unleavened bread shall be eaten seven days; and there shall no leavened bread be seen with thee, neither shall there be leaven seen with thee in all thy quarters.

content.13: And every firstling of an ass thou shalt redeem with a lamb; and if thou wilt not redeem it, then thou shalt break his neck: and all the firstborn of man among thy children shalt thou redeem.

content.19: And Moses took the bones of Joseph with him: for he had straitly sworn the children of Israel, saying, God will surely visit you; and ye shall carry up my bones away hence with you.
content.20: And they took their journey from Succoth, and encamped in Etham, in the edge of the wilderness.
content.22: He took not away the pillar of the cloud by day, nor the pillar of fire by night,
